Name: Surabaya-Green
Review Text: nice to have a nearby little mom-and-pop store that sells take-away indo food. nothing fancy and limited choices, but just enough if you want the basic food stuff with no frills.

Name: Surabaya-Green
Review Text: Its a basic looking takeout place, but the food is great. Owner is a real gentleman. Lots of Indo places in Amsterdam serving bland and sweet rubbish, but everything I had from here was good.

Name: Surabaya-Green
Review Text:
I love this place, and the owner is an absolute sweet heart! The food is amazing and quite affordable
I always go there!

Name: Surabaya-Green
Review Text: Nice food, good prices & friendly owner

Name: Surabaya-Green
Review Text: Poor quality, looks like an old cellar, food extremely expensive. Please cleanup your shop.

Name: Surabaya-Green
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Have been coming here for years. The shop looks a bit messy, but for me it is the best take-away Indonesian from Amsterdam. Really delicious (too) large portion of bami ramses with braising for € 9. We also have 2x …

Name: Surabaya-Green
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Always a friendly gentleman and always good food. Does not use vetsin or other chemical flavor enhancers ... Highly recommended for good traditional Indonesian dishes! …

Name: Surabaya-Green
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Hidden gem, addictive delicious Indo-sized portions for a small price. Not a special place to see, but top quality food! …

Name: Surabaya-Green
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Tasty Indonesian with lots of spices, lots of choice, fresh, large portions for little money. The friendly owner finishes it. …
